key_risks: Labor shortages, wage pressures, and high turnover rates
Seasonal revenue variability, particularly in regions with harsh winters
Economic sensitivity tied to the commercial real estate sector
Environmental and regulatory scrutiny over water usage, pesticide application, and waste management
Legal liabilities from labor-related lawsuits and compliance issues
controversies: Pending class action lawsuit related to wage and hour violations
Workplace safety issues and labor-related legal challenges
environmental_issues: Pesticide application and waste management concerns
social_issues: Labor disputes and high turnover rates
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance costs and litigation risks
ESG-related scrutiny and market sentiment pressures
